item.title: BOJ's Ueda Likely to Hold With Bond Market on His Side For Now
item.description: BOJ Likely to Keep Monetary Policy Unchanged The Bank of Japan (BOJ) is expected to keep its monetary policy unchanged at its meeting on Wednesday. Governor Kazuo Ueda has repeatedly signaled that the BOJ is in no rush to tighten policy, even as inflation rises.
